modName: Old And Rusty - Correction For aMidianBorn Whiterun (Grid)
summary: a small correction for the grid in Whiterun, Riften - Ratway, Thirsk, ...
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][color=#999999][size=4]


[/size][/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999]
[size=5]Old And Rusty: correction for aMidianBorn Whiterun
[size=3][i]
original:             Created by CaBaL
[/i][/size][/size][/color][/font][size=3][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999]a texture [/color][/font][font=Georgia][color=#999999][font=Georgia][color=#999999]correction[/color][/font]:      by clauDA



This is a small correction for the grid in [/color][color=#999999][color=#999999]Whiterun , [/color]Riften - Ratway, Thirsk, ...
If I use aMidianBorn Whiterun by CaBaL, the grids will be bright.  [/color][color=#999999]See image
If that's the case with you, my little texture can help.

Thanks to CaBaL and his fantastic mods.[/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#999999]I have reworked the texture, the mod belongs to CaBaL, the rights remain with CaBaL.

You need the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38491?tab=description]original[/url]﻿ mod of CaBaL .
(But it also functions without!)

After downloading the ZIP file, unpack the archive
and copy it to your Skyrim / Data directory.
Overwrite the texture of the original.
Only install 1024 or 2048.
Simple, for free . . .

You like it?  Do not forget to endorsed me  &  CaBaL !


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/89704/89704-1519069222-252452.png[/img]

[/color][/font][/i][/size]
[size=3][i][font=Georgia][color=#999999][i][size=3][size=3]
Thanks to all who have supported me so far...[/size]
[/size][size=3]My other mod link: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/11889623?tab=about+me]clauDA[/url][/size][size=3][size=3]
[/size][/size][/i]
Game Tip:  Rise of the King   [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q6RMjk0tgjI]Review[/url]

[/color][/font][/i][/size]
author: clauDA
